channel.title: Is it possible to store and install another apk inside an apk
channel.description: Well i wrote an android application, and i want to embed a backdoor in it which i made with msfvenom. Is it possible to embed that apk inside of mine and install when my application started ( the device is going to be rooted) ? By the way i am not talking about orientation to google play page of that apk of course.

item.title: Is it possible to store and install another apk inside an apk
item.dc:creator: system
item.description:
This topic was automatically closed 3 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible to store and install another apk inside an apk
